summary: The file contains a collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of various helper functions in the instructor.utils package, including batching helpers, classproperty handling, system message combination, JSON extraction from code blocks and streams, message merging, and JSON streaming utilities.
business_intent: To ensure the correctness and robustness of utility functions used throughout the project by testing normal operation and edge cases, thereby increasing confidence in the reliability of the instructor.utils module.
